fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- Traditional
- When any player stops in, a beneficial Product is provided to them, if they pay off the Rent without going Bankrupt.
- The Product is more powerful when the owner stops in, and they use it for free.
- Products are single-use items and may be traded like a Property. Any number of them may be used in one Turn.
- The first player to buy a Walmart property also gets a free sample of its Product immediately, which is the same version of the product other players get. This counts for Auctions, but not Trades.
- Cosmetically, Properties let you build Shelves instead of Houses and Hotels.
